# NSTextBlock.Layer

**Enumeration**

The following constants specify values used by the properties and methods [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/contentWidthValueType], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/setWidth(_:type:for:edge:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/setWidth(_:type:for:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/width(for:edge:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/widthValueType(for:edge:)] to specify text block layer values.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Layer
```

## Constants

- **NSTextBlock.Layer.padding**: Padding of the text block: space surrounding the content area extending to the border.
- **NSTextBlock.Layer.border**: The border of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Layer.margin**: Margin of the text block: space surrounding the border.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting and setting margins, borders, and padding

- **setWidth(_:type:for:edge:)**: Sets the width of a specified edge of a specified layer of the text block.
- **setWidth(_:type:for:)**: Sets the width of all edges of a specified layer of the text block.
- **width(for:edge:)**: Returns the width of an edge of a specified layer of the text block.
- **widthValueType(for:edge:)**: Returns the value type of an edge of a specified layer of the text block.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
